title: Psoriasis: A Comprehensive Review on the Aetiopathogenesis and Recent Advances in Long-Term Management of Patients with Plaque Psoriasis
author: Tanja Gmeiner; Jasna Grzelj; Borut Strukelj; Luka Stopar; Pij Bogomir Marko; Scientific Research Publishing
description: Discover the latest breakthroughs in psoriasis treatment, from systemic inflammation control to personalized medicine. Explore the impact on comorbidities and long-term management, with insights from pharmacogenetics and biomarker identification. Uncover the potential for reducing cardiovascular risk and improving patient outcomes.
